properties.media:imagetext:
PAN AMERICAN WORLD AIRWAYS SYSTEM
28-19 Briage Plaza North
Long Island City 1, N.Y.
There is (are) enclosed herewith the first flight cover(s) which
you forwarded on the recent inaugural air mail service between San
Francisco, California; Honolulu, I. H.; and Canton Island, to Sydney,
Australia, in care of our Agent at that point.
We trust you will find the cover(s) satisfactory.
Inquiries con-
cerning the cover(s), if any should arise, should be addressed to the
Postmaster to whom you forwarded the cover(s) for posting and not to
this Company. Our participation in this service was limited to return-
ing the cover(s) addressed in care of our Agent at Sydney to the senders
upon completion of the flight.
It is our expectation that, in the near future, we will have for
sale to all interested philatelists, first flight covers from Suva,
Fiji Islands, and Noumea, New Caledonia to Sydney, Australia. Also,
first flight covers
from Sydney, Australia to Noumea, Suva, Canton
Island, Honolulu and San Francisco, on the return trip. Up to this
date, however, the Australian Postal Service has not utilized the ser-
vices of Pan American Airways, Inc. for the carriage of their mails to
the points indicated above, but it is expected that the service will be
used in the very near future.
If your name is not on our philatelic list and you wish to receive
the announcement describing the above-mentioned first flight covers,
please advise us.
PAN AMERICAN AIRMAYS, INC.
Philatelic Section
